description: Agent-to-Agent Secure Communication Network - Post-quantum P2P gossip for AI agents

progress.blocking_reason: QUIC transport not binding on port 12000/UDP - mesh not forming

phase_2_1_summary: Phase 2.1 Complete - napi-rs Node.js bindings with EventEmitter pattern, 7 platform packages

review.summary: Excellent implementation. PeerCache with epsilon-greedy algorithm correct. 228/228 tests passing, zero warnings, proper error handling, comprehensive documentation. Approved for merge.

phase_2_2_summary: Phase 2.2 Complete - Python bindings via PyO3, 120/120 Python tests passing
phase_2_3_summary: Phase 2.3 Complete - CI/CD pipeline with 7-platform builds, security scanning, automated publishing
phase_2_4_summary: Phase 2.4 Complete - GPG-Signed SKILL.md with verification, A2A agent card, distribution scripts
phase_1_3_summary: Phase 1.3 Complete! All 12 tasks finished. Gossip overlay with HyParView membership (8-12 active, 64-128 passive), Plumtree pub/sub, SWIM failure detection, presence beacons (15min TTL), FOAF discovery (TTL=3, fanout=3), rendezvous shards (65536 content-addressed), coordinator adverts, anti-entropy IBLT reconciliation (30s). 264/264 tests passing, zero warnings.
phase_1_4_summary: Phase 1.4 Complete! All 10 tasks finished. CRDT Task Lists with OR-Set checkbox, LWW metadata registers, RGA ordering, Delta-CRDT for bandwidth efficiency, anti-entropy sync, Agent API integration, persistence layer, comprehensive integration tests. 264/264 tests passing, zero warnings.
phase_3_1_summary: Phase 3.1 BLOCKED - All 10 tasks completed but QUIC transport not binding. CI builds 2.5MB binary, all 6 VPS nodes deployed with systemd services active. Health endpoints responding but port 12000/UDP not binding - nodes show 0 peers. Root cause: Agent::join_network() or Network initialization not starting QUIC listener.
phase_1_2_summary: Phase 1.2 Complete! All 11 tasks finished. Tasks: 1-5 NetworkNode with connection mgmt (PeerId tracking, no unwrap() per Codex), 6 Message types, 7 Agent integration with join_network/subscribe/publish, 8 Bootstrap node discovery, 9-10 comprehensive tests, 11 documentation. Total: 265/265 tests passing, zero clippy warnings, bootstrap nodes configured.
phase_1_5_summary: Phase 1.5 Complete! All 8 tasks finished. MLS Group Encryption with group context derivation, per-epoch key rotation, forward secrecy, post-compromise security, MLS Welcome messages, presence beacons encrypted to MLS group, CRDT operations encrypted with group keys, invitation flow via direct QUIC connection. All tests passing, zero warnings.
